tokens.text: defines a complete voxel shape document

title: Voxel Shape Document
description: A behavior pack voxel shape document for Minecraft Bedrock Edition. This describes the complete JSON file structure including format_version and the minecraft:voxel_shape wrapper.

fields.title: Format Version
fields.description: The format version of this voxel shape file. Currently 1.21.110.

fields.title: Voxel Shape Definition
fields.description: The voxel shape definition container with description and shape data.
